attributes.action: Shut down unnecessary construction work,suppliers during the covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Shut down unnecessary sites. They arent key workers in this point in time key workers are supermarket workers, nhs staff, delivery drivers etc. I dont Class building a construction or supplying building materials at this point in time important.
attributes.background: To close unnecessary construction, building work and suppliers during the covid-19 outbreak. Some have already closed but some have stay open  it's not necessary at this point in time for them to be working.
